title: Tech talk. Episodes 17 & 18.
creator_credit: John Kyle, Allenog Pty Ltd and Channel 0\28
brief_description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. Details of what various jobs entail, the neccessary qualifications and how to go about getting the job are provided. There is also a segment on survival skills. Presented by Michael Schildberger the topics covered:- customs officer, interpreter, footwear trade/manufacture, unemployment benefits/money management, secretary, cartographer/map making, glazier and youth in danger/dangers of leaving home.
